title: Feedback
heading: Incrementally, Iteratively & Collaborativelly
introduction: We love feedback. We favor it working in small steps, validating each of them and making each success a team success.

features.title: Iterative
features.description:
Communication flows both ways.
Developers validate what they do.
POs validate what they think.

features.title: Collaboration
features.description:
We help each other
and learn as a team.
We all win or lose, together.

content:
Since SW Development is all about Formalizing Knowledge, close collaboration between Business Experts and Developers is required.

We work as a Team. Small steps. Open communication. Close collaboration.

Agile is based on several principles and one we like the most, is the aknowledgement of the uncertainty. We clarify things together. We build the solution together.

Working in small Increments, we Iterate to validate them and this increases Collaboration. We love early feedback. We fail fast and small. We learn rapidly.
